item.title: Elephants Dream
item.description: Elephants Dream is a computer-generated short film that was produced almost completely using the free software 3D suite Blender

item.title: Big Buck Bunny
item.description: Big Buck Bunny is a short computer animated film by the Blender Institute.

item.title: Sintel Trailer
item.description: Sintel is a short computer animated film by the Blender Institute.
